content: That reminds me. We did this one lecture kind of talking out polonius and stopped. I don't hvae a lot of time to prep, but I think I would get some value out of just talking through polonius in more detail on a regular bsais, trying to cover the naive/optimized rules
And thus for us to try and remember what the reasons behind it all are =)
Should we consider trying to schedule a regular zoom call doing that?
Not least because I will have to explain it in my thesis/report :)
